DOC.brief_title: Take-Care Program : Effectiveness Physical Therapy Program Cancer Related Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility Criteria 1 , diagnosis breast cancer ( stage I-IIIA ) ; 2 , 25-65 year ; 3 , finish co-adjuvant treatment except hormone-therapy ; 4 , active cancer ; 5 , interest improve lifestyle increase physical activity ; , 6 , present 3 5 follow physical finding , judge oncologist refer patient : neck shoulder pain symptom , reduce range motion neck- shoulder area , reduce physical capacity , psychological problem , increase fatigue , sleep disturbance , problem coping reduce physical psychosocial functioning . Principal Outcomes Fatigue Score : Piper Fatigue Scale Mood State : Profile Mood State Quality Life : QLQ-BR23
DOC.criteria: Finished oncology treatment ( chemotherapy , radiation , surgery ) Other musculoskeletal condition .
